com::xuggle::xuggler::Property

com::xuggle::xuggler::Property Class Reference

#include <Property.h>

Inheritance diagram for com::xuggle::xuggler::Property:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A wrapper for an FFMPEG AVOption value.

Definition at line 35 of file Property.h.

int32_t com::xuggle::xuggler::Property::getNumFlagSettings (  )  [virtual]

If this IProperty is of the type Type#PROPERTY_FLAGS, this method will tell you how many different flag settings it takes.

Returns:
Number of flag settings, or <0 if not a FLAGS value

Implements com::xuggle::xuggler::IProperty.

00280     try {
00281       if (getType() != IProperty::PROPERTY_FLAGS)
00282         throw std::runtime_error("flag is not of type PROPERTY_FLAGS");
00283       
00284       // now, iterate through all options, counting all CONSTS that belong
00285       // to the same unit as this option
00286       const char* unit = getUnit();
00287       if (!unit || !*unit)
00288         throw std::runtime_error("flag doesn't have a unit setting, so can't tell what constants");

00291       AVClass fakeClass;
00292       fakeClass.class_name="XuggleFakeClass";
00293       fakeClass.item_name = fakeContextToName;
00294       fakeClass.option = mOptionStart;
00295       AVClass *fakeClassPtr = &fakeClass;
00296       
00297       const AVOption* last = 0;
00298       do
00299       {
00300         last = av_next_option(&fakeClassPtr, last);
00301         if (last &&
00302             last->unit &&
00303             last->type == FF_OPT_TYPE_CONST &&
00304             strcmp(unit, last->unit)==0)
00305           ++retval;
00306       } while(last);
00307     }
00308     catch (std::exception & e)
00309     {
00310       VS_LOG_DEBUG("Error: %s", e.what());
00311       retval = -1;
00312     }
00313     return retval;

IProperty * com::xuggle::xuggler::Property::getFlagConstant ( int32_t  position  )  [virtual]

If this IProperty is of the type Type#PROPERTY_FLAGS, this method will give you another IProperty representing a constant setting for that flag.

Parameters:
position The position number for the flag; Must be in range 0 <= position <= getNumFlagSettings().
Returns:
An IProperty object for the flag setting, or null if not available.

Implements com::xuggle::xuggler::IProperty.

IProperty * com::xuggle::xuggler::Property::getPropertyMetaData ( void *  context,
int32_t  propertyNo 
) [static]

Returns the metadata for the numbered property.

Note that a property number is guaranteed to stay constant during this run of Xuggler, but the property number may change if the process restarts.

Parameters:
context AVClass to search for options in

Returns:
the meta data for this property, or null if not found
